TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit Toolset extends System.Object

span.span: Represent an aggregation of a tools version (eg.

summary.span: “2.0”）、工具路径以及可选的关联属性集的聚合。

span.span: "2.0"), tools path, and optional set of associated properties.

remarks.format: ## Remarks UNDONE: (danmose) 查看保持不变。UNDONE: (danmose) Review immutability. 如果这不是不可变的添加一种机制来通知拥有它要递增其 toolsetVersion 项目集合/s。If this is not immutable, add a mechanism to notify the project collection/s owning it to increment their toolsetVersion.

summary.span: 创建一个具有给定的工具版本和工具路径的工具集。

span.span: Creates a toolset with the given tools version and tools path.

summary.span: 将从给定的项目集合中获取全局属性、保留属性和环境属性。

span.span: Global, reserved, and environment properties are taken from the given project collection.

MemberSignature.Value: public string DefaultSubToolsetVersion { get; }
.property instance string DefaultSubToolsetVersion
Public ReadOnly Property DefaultSubToolsetVersion As String
public: property System::String ^ DefaultSubToolsetVersion { System::String ^ get(); };
member this.DefaultSubToolsetVersion : string

summary.span: 获取此工具集的默认子工具集版本。

span.span: Gets the default sub toolset version for this toolset.

value.span: 返回默认子工具集版本。

span.span: Returns the default sub toolset version.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果[!INCLUDE[vs_dev10_long](~/includes/vs-dev10-long-md.md)]是安装，使用基本工具集，并返回"10.0"子工具集版本。If [!INCLUDE[vs_dev10_long](~/includes/vs-dev10-long-md.md)] is installed, use the base toolset and return a sub toolset version of "10.0". 否则，请使用找到的最高版本控制的子工具集。Otherwise, use the highest-versioned sub toolset found. 按数字顺序; 排序与带编号的版本的子工具集任何其他子工具集附加到找到的顺序列表的开头。Sub toolsets with numbered versions are ordered numerically; any additional sub toolsets are prepended to the beginning of the list in the order found. 如果不没有可用的任何子工具集，则返回 null 和[!INCLUDE[vs_dev10_long](~/includes/vs-dev10-long-md.md)]未安装。Returns null if there is no sub toolset available and [!INCLUDE[vs_dev10_long](~/includes/vs-dev10-long-md.md)] is not installed.

summary.span: 创建将与此工具集一起使用的子工具集版本。

span.span: Creates the sub toolset version to be used with this toolset.

MemberSignature.Value: public string GenerateSubToolsetVersion ();
.method public hidebysig instance string GenerateSubToolsetVersion() cil managed
Public Function GenerateSubToolsetVersion () As String
public: System::String ^ GenerateSubToolsetVersion();
member this.GenerateSubToolsetVersion : unit -> string

summary.span: 创建将与此工具集一起使用的子工具集版本。

span.span: Creates the sub toolset version to be used with this toolset.

returns.span: 返回将与此工具集一起使用的子工具集版本。

span.span: Returns the sub toolset version to be used with this toolset.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果"VisualStudioVersion"上的工具集本身设置为一个属性，则会将子工具集版本设置为"VisualStudioVersion"。If "VisualStudioVersion" is set as a property on the toolset itself, then sub toolset version is set to "VisualStudioVersion". 否则，子工具集版本设置为的工具集 DefaultSubToolsetVersion。Otherwise, sub toolset version is set to the DefaultSubToolsetVersion of the toolset.

MemberSignature.Value: public string GenerateSubToolsetVersion (System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary<string,string> overrideGlobalProperties, int solutionVersion);
.method public hidebysig instance string GenerateSubToolsetVersion(class System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary`2<string, string> overrideGlobalProperties, int32 solutionVersion) cil managed
Public Function GenerateSubToolsetVersion (overrideGlobalProperties As IDictionary(Of String, String), solutionVersion As Integer) As String
public: System::String ^ GenerateSubToolsetVersion(System::Collections::Generic::IDictionary<System::String ^, System::String ^> ^ overrideGlobalProperties, int solutionVersion);
member this.GenerateSubToolsetVersion : System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary<string, string> * int -> string

param.name: overrideGlobalProperties
param.span: 设置全局属性以用以创建子工具集版本。

span.span: Set of global properties to use to create the sub toolset version.

param.span: 可能为 null。

span.span: May be null.

param.name: solutionVersion
param.span: 使用创建子工具集版本的解决方案版本。

span.span: The solution version to use to create the sub toolset version.

summary.span: 创建将与此工具集一起使用的子工具集版本。

span.span: Creates the sub toolset version to be used with this toolset.
Returns the sub toolset version.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果"VisualStudioVersion"中的全局属性集存在全局属性中传递，则会将子工具集版本设置为"VisualStudioVersion"。If the "VisualStudioVersion" global property exists in the set of global properties passed in, then sub toolset version is set to "VisualStudioVersion". 否则，如果"VisualStudioVersion"上的工具集本身设置为一个属性，则子工具集版本是设置为"VisualStudioVersion"。Otherwise, if "VisualStudioVersion" is set as a property on the toolset itself, then sub toolset version is set to "VisualStudioVersion". 否则为如果对应于解决方案版本的 Visual Studio 版本 (Visual Studio 版本 = 解决方案版本 – 1) 中传递映射到现有的子工具集，则子工具集版本设置为 Visual Studio 的版本。Otherwise, if the Visual Studio version corresponding to the solution version (Visual Studio version = solution version – 1) passed in maps to an existing sub toolset, then sub toolset version is set to the Visual Studio version. 否则，子工具集版本设置为的工具集 DefaultSubToolsetVersion。Otherwise, sub toolset version is set to the DefaultSubToolsetVersion of the toolset.

summary.span: 获取给定属性名称和子工具集版本指定的属性。

span.span: Gets property specified by the given property name and sub toolset version.

returns.span: 如果找到指定的属性，则返回该属性，否则返回 null。

span.span: Returns the property specified, if it is found, otherwise returns null.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果在子工具集找不到该属性，搜索中的基本工具集的属性。If the property is not found in the sub toolset, searches for the property in the base toolset. 如果在子工具集或基本工具集中找不到该属性，则返回 null。If the property is not found in the sub toolset or the base toolset, returns null.
